original_title: The one time Scott Jennings got every liberal on CNN to shut up and listen   — The Donald
article_summary: Article discusses a debate on CNN where Scott Jennings emphasized the need to focus on America's progress rather than its past mistakes, specifically slavery. The discussion sparked comments about the role of whites and blacks in perpetuating slavery, the holocaust, and contemporary issues like inner-city gangs. The key takeaway is a sentiment of frustration and exhaustion expressed by some commenters about the continuous blame and emotional manipulation associated with historical atrocities.</s>
